creator: praveen.g04@gmail.com
text:
Unable to start httpd on windows 2008 german. When i try to start througn comand line using httpd.exe a windows popup occurs and says problem with libapr-1.dll.
Please help this asap.As this is a show stopper for me

creator: hidonet@gmail.com

As far as I can tell from your crash messages, you're running a third-party distribution of Apache, EasyPHP, version 3.1. Their latest version appears to be 5.3.0. I'm not able to determine what version of Apache you're using, but I don't think it's 2.3-head, as EasyPHP doesn't provide anything later than 2.2.13

Is this still an issue? If so, I'd strongly recommend that you take it up with the EasyPHP folks. Perhaps they can offer more insight. In any case, we don't support third-party binary distributions of httpd.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
